content: I like those ideas. I think I'll start by creating a garden map and using plant labels to identify each section. I'll also keep a garden journal to track my progress and note any observations or concerns. Speaking of progress, I've been thinking about my compost bin and how I can improve it. Do you have any tips on how to maintain a healthy compost bin? By the way, I started watering my herb garden every morning today, and it's been great to see everything thriving.
